reasoning: Discoid lupus erythematosus (DLE) incidence ~4 per 100k person-years, may be slightly more common than SLE. Limited population-based registry data; estimates based on dermatology cohort studies.
source: Gronhagen CM et al. (2011). Incidence of cutaneous lupus erythematosus in Sweden. Br J Dermatol. 165(3):591-596
